contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of May 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED as to Issue A and is DENIED as to all other issues. The Order of the Superior Court is REVERSED. See, Commonwealth v. White, 543 Pa. 45, 669 A.2d 896 (1995).
CASTILLE, J., dissents based upon his dissenting opinion in Commonwealth v. White.
